minions.name: Laseratops
minions.description: Destroy a minion of power 4 or less on this base

minions.name: Armor Stego
minions.description: Ongoing: Has +2 power during other players' turns

minions.name: War Raptor
minions.description: Ongoing: Gains +1 power for each War Raptor on this base (including this one)

actions.name: Augmentation
actions.description: One minion gains +4 power until the end of your turn

actions.name: Howl
actions.description: Each of your minions gains +1 power until the end of your turn

actions.name: Natural Selection
actions.description: Choose one of your minions on a base. Destroy a minion there with less power than yours

actions.name: Upgrade
actions.description: Play on a minion. Ongoing: This minion has +2 power

actions.name: Tooth and Claw... and Guns
actions.description: Play on a minion. Ongoing: If an ability would affect this minion, destroy this card and the ability does not affect this minion

actions.name: Survival of the Fittest
actions.description: Destroy the lowest-power minion (you choose in case of a tie) on each base with a higher-power minion

actions.name: Wildlife Preserve
actions.description: Play on a base. Ongoing: Your minions here are not affected by other players' actions

actions.name: Rampage
actions.description: Reduce the breakpoint of a base by the power of one of your minions on that base until the end of the turn
